trans-unit.source: Represents a lexical scope within <xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod"></xref>, providing access to the start and end offsets of the scope, as well as its child and parent scopes.
trans-unit.target: 表示內的語彙範圍<xref href="System.Diagnostics.SymbolStore.ISymbolMethod"> </xref>、 提供存取權的開始和結束位移的範圍，以及其子系和父範圍。

trans-unit.source: The ISymbolScope interface also provides access to all locals defined within the current scope.
trans-unit.target: ISymbolScope 介面也提供存取目前的範圍內定義的所有區域變數。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This interface is the managed counterpart of the `ISymUnmanagedScope` interface, which is one of the unmanaged symbol store interfaces that provide an alternate way to read and write debug symbol information.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個介面是 managed 對應項目`ISymUnmanagedScope`介面，也就是其中一個 unmanaged 的符號存放區介面提供讀取與寫入偵錯符號資訊的替代方式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the end offset of the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前語彙範圍的結束位移。

trans-unit.source: The end offset of the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 目前語彙範圍的結束位移。

trans-unit.source: Gets the child lexical scopes of the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得的子語彙範圍的目前語彙範圍。

trans-unit.source: The child lexical scopes that of the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 子系語彙範圍的目前語彙範圍。

trans-unit.source: Gets the local variables within the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前語彙範圍內的區域變數。

trans-unit.source: The local variables are returned in no particular order.
trans-unit.target: 本機變數會傳回任何特定順序排列。

trans-unit.source: If a local variable changes its address within the current scope, that variable is returned multiple times, each with a different offset range.
trans-unit.target: 如果區域變數變更其在目前範圍內的位址，該變數會傳回許多次，各有不同的位移範圍。

trans-unit.source: The local variables within the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 目前語彙範圍內的區域變數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespaces that are used within the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前範圍內使用的命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The namespaces that are used within the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 目前的範圍內使用之命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets the method that contains the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含目前語彙範圍的方法。

trans-unit.source: The method that contains the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 包含目前語彙範圍的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent lexical scope of the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得父語彙範圍的目前範圍。

trans-unit.source: The parent lexical scope of the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 在目前範圍的父語彙範圍。

trans-unit.source: Gets the start offset of the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前語彙範圍的起始位移。

trans-unit.source: The start offset of the current lexical scope.
trans-unit.target: 目前語彙範圍的起始位移。
